title: Report Theft of Materials
description: A foreman arrives on site in the morning and discovers a pallet of copper wire has been stolen overnight.

tasks.description: Log the theft in the daily site log, including the type and estimated quantity of stolen material.
tasks.expected_outcome: The theft is documented in the daily log.

tasks.description: File a police report with the local police department regarding the theft.
tasks.expected_outcome: A police report is filed and a report number is obtained.

tasks.description: Notify the project manager and the insurance company of the theft.
tasks.expected_outcome: All relevant internal and external stakeholders are notified.
